content: out of the ds you just knitted p until next ds pdsx2 tw k 15 rounds or the same number of rounds you knit before the leg colourwork chart row 7 make ds out of ds you just purled k until next ds kdsx2 tw repeat row 6 & 7 another 8 9 times then heel repeat row 6 once more the heel is worked flat across the first 32 36 resolution round 1 make ds k until next stitches after the bor marker the following ds kds k until end of round instructions are for a german short row resolution round 2 sm kds knit until heel while any heel will work i recommend bor marker some variety of short row heel as foot pattern does not balance well after gusset decreases row 1 k 32 36 tw foot k 10 rounds or your preferred length before beginning the foot colourwork chart slipping the bor marker as you come to it as before make note of the actual number of rounds as you will be repeating this after the colourwork section is finished join cc and begin working foot colourwork chart 20 rounds found on the last page slipping the bor marker as you come to it break cc k 10 rounds or the same number of rounds you knit before the colourwork slipping the bor marker as you come to it toe round 1 sm k1 ssk k26 30 k2tog k1 pm k1 ssk k26 30 k2tog k1 round 2 sm k all sts round 3 *sm k1 ssk k until 3 sts before m k2tog k1* repeat *-* once more repeat rounds 2-3 10 11 more times until 20 24 sts remain 10 12 each for the instep and sole graft toe sts using kitchener stitch weave in ends and block to measurements i d like to thank my test knitter lauren miller for her kindness and exceptional help when working with me to make this publication a reality i really could not have done it without you i d also like to thank you the knitter for letting me share my ideas with you it is a beautiful thing to create together happy knitting -shelbi leg colourwork chart foot colourwork chart
